May 17, 2003 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-fourth-section
Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Solo Cornet (Llwydcoed) Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 3 bands competed
Feb. 11, 2012, 6:07 p.m. June 30, 2020, 8:41 p.m.
